abstract: The Seattle-based Internet retailer reported that net income in the first quarter rose 30 percent to $143 million from the year-ago quarter.
snippet: The Seattle-based Internet retailer reported that net income in the first quarter rose 30 percent to $143 million from the year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  An economic slowdown has not affected the nation’s largest online retailer, Amazon.com.

headline.main: Amazon Gains, Despite an Economic Slowdown
headline.print_headline: Amazon Gains, Despite An Economic Slowdown

abstract: RightScale, a software service provider for applications that run on Amazon Web services, is expected to announce Thursday that it raised $4.5 million in first-round of funding from Benchmark Capital, CNet News.com reported.
lead_paragraph: RightScale, a software service provider for applications that run on Amazon Web services, is expected to announce Thursday that it raised $4.5 million in first-round of funding from Benchmark Capital, CNet News.com reported.

headline.main: Benchmark Said to Pour $4.5 Million into Cloud Computing
